data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Even though there are no other DBIx::TableReferences::* modules, I
    see this module as a MSSQL specialisation of a general utility. It
    is all about discovering the declared referential constraints within
    a database, and all RDBMS will have (should have) this attribute
    according to the relational model.
